p: It is very common that antibiotics enter the sewage. According to the statistics reports, there is no HWW without antibiotics, and their contents are at high pollution levels [44], [45]. The antibiotics are discharged into the urban sewage treatment plant through the pipe network. Generally, the sealing effect of the pipe is not up to the standard, leading to the leakage of sewage. It would thus contaminant the soil and groundwater.
